title: JSON schema for CDNJS client-side library

files.description: The file names of the individual file in the library.

items.description: The file name of an individual file in the library to copy to the project.

packageId.description: The name of the package as it exist on cdnjs.com

path.description: The relative folder path from this config file to the location where the library files should be copied to.

providerId.description: The unique identifier of the provider
